name: Hanging Around (Anthony)
description:
This is a story about Dark and Light. They are two mountain climbers set out to climb a large mountain. The thing is, they are both lazy and only one of them will be climbing at a given time, while the other dangles on the rope. As you climb the mountain, you have to switch between Dark and Light.

Controls:
Arrow keys/WASD/Left Joystick to move
Space/Right button to switch between Light and Dark
